items.sentence: Tom told me that he thought that Mary would be confused.
Do you know why Tom doesn\'t want me to sit next to him?
I thought you said we weren\'t going to do that anymore.
I thought you said you\'d like to know why Tom did that.
I wasn\'t having as much fun as Tom seemed to be having.
You should take your umbrella with you in case it rains.
Tom walked out to his office carrying a couple of boxes.
Tom wanted to give Mary something nice for her birthday.
Tom was barely able to keep the canoe from tipping over.
Tom would have become a boxer if his mother had let him.
